unnormalised: Training regimens are wild, no? Like Kohli sweating it out at NCA, Bangalore. Dr. Sharma designs killer plans! Remember Milkha Singh's brutal hill runs? Gotta push beyond those 5 km. Heard kabaddi players build insane endurance too. Rs. 10,000 gym membership ain't enough, dedication is key. Gotta find the right routine in your tiny 200 sq ft room! What's your go-to?
